attributes.action: Open the doors for all late tax returns from the self-employed to claim SEISS 4
attributes.additional_details: Without the grant many self employed people especially salon workers who have been prevented from earning their livings for much longer than other industry workers. Together with their families will sink deeper into deprivation.  Essential bills remain unpaid, possible starvation and homelessness promoting sickness and possibly worst.
attributes.background: The government should allow Self employed people more time to complete and submit 2019-2020 tax returns. Moreover an extension of up to 4 weeks is requested due to the national constraints. To help those who needed extra time. The SEISS grants is crucial financial support they genuinely need.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577932
